author: Robb Collins
description: Mustard is perhaps an unlikely fit with rum, pineapple and lemon juice but they sit together in this very unusual daiquiri-style cocktail. Be careful not to overdo the mustard.
name: Hollywood Blvd
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
